problem_text_cn: 如图,点P是⊙O的直径AB延长线上的一点,过点P作⊙O的切线PC,切点为C,若AO=OB=PB=1,则PC的长是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, point P is a point on the extended line AB of the diameter of ⊙O, passing point P to draw the tangent PC of ⊙O, and the tangent point is C. If AO = OB = PB = N_0, then the length of PC is ()
raw_answer: 解:连接OC．∵PC是切线,∴OC⊥PC．在直角△OPC中,OC=OB=1,OP=OB+PB=2．∴PC=√{0P^{2}-0C^{2}}=√{3}．故选:B．
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质定理,已知切线常用的辅助线就是连接圆心和切线,构造直角三角形．
